title: Interview for "Better Left Unsaid" Documentary
description:
This far-reaching interview was done by Curt Jaimungal who is preparing a documentary, Better Left Unsaid, exploring when the political left goes too far.

Original video here: https://youtu.be/bzRGZMbK_5g

In his exploration he has already interviewed John Vervaeke and Janice Fiamengo. 

You can support his project here: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/better-left-unsaid/#/
Twitter: @BLUthefilm
YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdWIQh9DGG6uhJk8eyIFl1w

My links:

Flood help: https://www.gofundme.com/help-the-pageau-family-rebuild

To support this channel specifically:
https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonatha...
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/
